TopicTitle: Maybe you havent heard the news

Articles.Content:
But UE4 is now a free open source program. (some % when you exceed some selling figure)

What I mean is

Are we gonna see a game engine swich?. ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif) .

Er, no. Not so close to 1.0

Changing engines takes quite a lot of work.

I figured it by myself but the move was impressive nontheless. I would like to hear from devs if the change will improve the game overall ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
The unreal engine is more flexible than unity. But an engine switch isn't likely after all this time. Maybe way after 1.0, they could port it. But it would take a lot of work, so I doubt it.
Uranium Enrichment 4? United Emirates? University of Evansville? Unalloyed Excitement?
Sounds amazing, does that mean modding UE4 games is easy now or is there some stipulation in there?

> 
> Uranium Enrichment 4? United Emirates? University of Evansville? Unalloyed Excitement?

I *think* he means "Unreal Engine 4". 

Or Unaligned Emigrants 4. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> I *think* he means "Unreal Engine 4". 
> Or Unaligned Emigrants 4. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Aw yeah! Undecided Egyptians is free!

(On Topic: Ooh, very shiny.)

HarvesteR himself once (2ish years ago) said that switching from Unity to any other engine was out of the question.

Of course they said before that Multiplayer and ISRU were similarly not going to happen.

Twice this gets 'suggested' in little under a day. ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112196-Could-KSP-Switch-To-Using-Unreal-Engine-4](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112196-Could-KSP-Switch-To-Using-Unreal-Engine-4)

Porting the game to another engine would require almost a complete re-write. Unreal is different but not 'better'.

> 
> Twice this gets 'suggested' in little under a day. ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112196-Could-KSP-Switch-To-Using-Unreal-Engine-4](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112196-Could-KSP-Switch-To-Using-Unreal-Engine-4)
> Porting the game to another engine would require almost a complete re-write. Unreal is different but not 'better'.

Also, how many of these threads do you really need?

Closing!
